Entre le bassin de Thau et les collines: Between the Thau basin and pine hills, discover organic wines born from a family endeavor, from father to daughter, in harmony with nature.
Au cœur des appellations Languedoc et Pi: At the heart of the Languedoc and Picpoul de Pinet appellations, La Croix Gratiot estate is rooted in a terroir rich in colors. Nestled on clay-limestone hills and caressed by sea breezes laden with the scents of the garrigue, our vineyard stretches over 35 hectares.
Ici, la passion du vin se transmet de pè: Here, the passion for wine is passed from father to daughter. Yves, along with his brother Hugues, cultivated the vines on the family lands before founding the cellar in 2004. His daughter, Anaïs, after traveling the world and enhancing her expertise, returned to her family roots, determined to perpetuate and renew the art of winemaking.
Notre philosophie se fonde sur un profon: Our philosophy is grounded in a deep respect for nature, the terroir, and humanity. Guided by biodynamic principles, we aspire to viticulture that lives in harmony with its ecosystem, valuing biodiversity and environmental balance.

Sensible à l’art et à la musique, La Cro: Sensitive to art and music, La Croix Gratiot takes pleasure in awakening the senses to gustatory or artistic emotions. Our estate is a crossroads where conviviality and creativity come together through festive events and artistic collaborations.
